titles.title: A bill to require the Architect of the Capitol to develop a plan to reduce carbon dioxide emissions from the Capitol complex, with the goal of achieving carbon neutrality at the complex by December 31, 2020.
Clean Capitol Act of 2007
Clean Capitol Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Clean Capitol Act of 2007 - Requires the Architect of the Capitol to develop a plan to reduce emissions of carbon dioxide from the Capitol complex, with the goal of achieving carbon neutrality at the complex by December 31, 2020.
